note:
I like photography, music, electronics, synths, repairing things, collecting old technology, reading books, learning languages, exploring, writing, fountain pens, Linux gaming, FLOSS, beautiful things, and many more. I'm interested in all kinds of knowledge; I can't stop my curiosity.
